E2T7BA.original: ~z~You know how to use those things, don't you? Blow some shit up.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~那玩意你会用的，对吧？炸点东西啊。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Sad to say, but that might be the best place for us right now, T.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~很遗憾，但这可能是目前最安全的归宿了，T。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~"Cornered by bikerz. Eugh. Eugh. Eugh. 2 young 2 die."
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~「被飞车党困住了。啊，啊，啊。5还不想4。」

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Can't the cops give us a break?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~警察就不能让我们喘口气吗？我交了税的，混蛋！

E2T7BA.original: ~z~A chopper too? Perfect, must be my day.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~还派直升机？绝了，我也是服了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~You had your head in the oven?
~z~Look, this the money we agreed upon less ten percent. Just give us the ice.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~听着，箱子里是之前说好的价，打了九折。把钻石拿来。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Stealth tactics, Lou. Stay out of sight.
~z~Fuck off, copper! It's the bikers you want.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~滚开，条子！你应该去抓飞车党。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Hey uh... What's going on?...uh...Right. Which one of you is Mr. Tony?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~嘿...你们好吗？那个...哪一位是Tony先生？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~- Oh my god, that is so funny.~n~ - I know!
~z~Maybe he'd be okay if he'd been trying to get the fuck out of there rather than typing on his Bittersweet. Dumb vain motherfucker!
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~有这闲工夫发动态，拿来逃命早就活下来了。虚荣的傻逼！

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Don't you dare crash 'cause I'm not putting my fucking seatbelt on.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~你别撞车了，老子没系安全带。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~- Here we go.~n~- No no no no no. Not again.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~－过来吧。~n~－不不不，不不不。别来那个。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~but I liked the guy and I'm kind of sad. Okay?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~但我还是喜欢他，为此感到伤心。好吗？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I'll take the wheel, man. Just calm down a minute.
~z~Sorry, Costas honey. We've got to get out of here!
~z~He's not answering his phone, I'll check his Bleeter.
~z~They'll lock us up and throw away the keys.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我们会被关进大牢，一辈子出不去。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Alright, you got what we're looking for?
~z~I can't believe it, man. What's it say?
~z~Can't the LCPD tell a crook from an honest citizen.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~LCPD分不清暴徒和良民的区别吗？混账。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~So anyway, Sharon, I think I'm gonna sell my car.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我说我说我说，Sharon，我想把车子卖掉。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Fuck off Evan. This is work. It's not working out.
~z~Tell him you've been selling me coke? He will love that!
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~告诉他你一直卖我可卡因？他会高兴死的！

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Well, I didn't like him. He's dead and he's still pissing me off.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我是不喜欢他。他死了，但还是激怒我了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Evan's not answering his phone. He's dead. I know it.
~z~Oh, I know. Listen, Gracie, tell your father, tell him...
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~好，接着。听着，Gracie，告诉你爹，告诉他...

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I know. Fuck. Poor Evan, he was a rotten human being.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我知道。操。可怜的Evan，他是个烂人。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~That or he's run off with the ice, bro. Either way I don't think we seeing him or them diamonds again.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~也可能是带着钻石逃走了。横竖我们都见不到他和钻石了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~It's getting to be bad for business.
~z~He went the other way with those diamonds. Probably on the next plane to Los Santos, if you ask me.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~他带着钻石从另一头逃跑了。要我说可能在飞去洛圣都的路上了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I got a bad feeling about that thing. Blow it, Lou.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我对那玩意有不好的预感。炸了它，Lou。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Shit, Lou. Looks like we walked into a military exercise.
~z~That conceited fuck was too dumb to keep his head back there and we lost the diamonds because of it.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~那个自大的傻逼蠢到丢了脑袋，还害我们丢了钻石。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I just checked his Bleeter. They got him.
~z~This is what I get for employing an ex-con.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~雇前科犯办事就是这个下场。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Those diamonds are gone too, Lou. We're really in the shit now.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~就连钻石都丢了，Lou。这回真的麻烦了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~The cops are blocking the road! Shouldn't they be helping us?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~警察封路了！他们不应该帮我们吗？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Oh, Luis, you always gotta act so tough. Just have a fucking line and chill out, like me. You people.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~噢，Luis，别老是凶神恶煞的，吸上一口放松一下吧。你们这些人啊。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Then..then I'll get the ice. Hold on.
~z~I mean, my heart is beating two hundred beats a minute. You almost put me in the hospital.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~真的，心脏病都要被吓出来了。差点没当场去世。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Don't be so callous. I think they killed him.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~别那么冷血。我觉得他遇害了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Hold on, guys. I wanna come too.
~z~Shit. They shot him. They shot him!
~z~I may be a substance abusing wreck, but you're gonna need to do something about that temper.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~也许我确实是吸毒成瘾的废人，但你也该注意下你的暴脾气了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I think I need another fucking line, okay?
~z~Those crazy assholes are right on us. Look behind you.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~那帮疯子要追上来了。看你后面。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Try it, bro. I'll happily do more time for you.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~试试呗，兄弟。坐几年牢我不亏的。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~That's the stupidest thing I ever heard.
~z~Shit. Get these cops out of here.
~z~Shit, there's a police roadblock. We're going to get killed.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~操，警察设了路障。我们死定了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Check the van! Full of leather clad skinheads, and they call me gay?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~注意货车！一群光头加皮衣，谁才是基佬啊？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I'm staring them in the fucking eye.
~z~We can't stop and chat to these guys. Get them out the way.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~没空停车跟他们讲道理，送走他们。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~We're getting robbed here, you dumb pig.
~z~Don't get cute, Lou. Shut up and lose those fucks.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~别抖机灵了，Lou。闭嘴甩掉这群臭逼。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~He updated a social networking site?! The fuck is wrong with him? What it say?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~他还在发动态？！这人什么毛病？写了啥？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~The fucking bikers are right behind us.
~z~Great. They're coming at us from the air as well.
~z~We're meant to be having fun here... I'm having fun. I am. Where's my fucking phone?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我们是来找乐子的...我就很开心，真的。我他妈手机呢？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Because of that thing, T? Come on that sparkly thing? Wake up, you junkie fag.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~因为那档事，T？那个亮闪闪的玩意？醒醒，吸毒死基佬。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~We can play the blame game after we're off the most wanted list.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~下了FIB的通缉名单以后再说分锅的事吧。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Get that van full of bikers, Lou.
~z~We have a line in some kitchen supplies, how about I throw that into the equation, what's the price?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我有一条搞到厨房用品的门路。你把这些也算进去，开价多少？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~No you didn't, bro. You kept him around because you were bored and needy.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~不，你不喜欢。留着他是因为你寂寞又缺爱。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Yeah, passed out. Again. Guy's a fucking mess, Luis. Holding you back.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~对，他又晕倒了。简直是一团糟，Luis。拖你后腿。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Shit, poor Costas. We gotta lose these fucks!
~z~We need to get through this. Do something, Lou.
~z~Calm down, Luis. You'd think your boyfriend had just been killed.
~z~Luis is always such a buzz kill.
~z~Alright. It was a weird move, I'll give you that, but he's dead. Killed by social networking.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~好吧，这样是挺蠢的，我承认。但他死了，被社交网络害死了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~- He holds everyone back. ~n~- No he doesn't.
~z~What the fuck is that? They sending armored cars after us now? Jesus!
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~这他妈啥啊？还派装甲车追我们？天哪！

E2T7BA.original: ~z~That's why I liked him so much.
~z~Look at that van. Those fucking bikers are in there as well.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~看那辆货车。那里面也有飞车党。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~It serves me right for leaving the party with you losers.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~跟着两个废物离开派对以后得提提神。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Can you try and get that fucking chopper?
~z~So, how much we in for now, T? We liable for that two mil'?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~现在陷得有多深了，T？要赔那两百万吗？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Yeah, tell him if he wants a good fake tan or some hair gel, Rocco can hook him up.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~对，告诉他如果想来点美黑霜和发胶，就去找Rocco要。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Oh right, right, that thing... that shit. That thing! Okay Luis, right, we gotta go. Ladies, have some fun.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~哦对，那件事...那玩意。是那件事！好了，Luis，该出发了。女士们，玩得开心。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~He may have been a coke addict trying to squeeze every last penny I have out of me,
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~他也许是个不折不扣的人渣，还想榨干我身上的每一分钱去吸毒，

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Who? What is wrong with you? Man, you are ruining my buzz, Luis.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~谁？你是不是有病，大哥？心情都被你毁了，Luis。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~We got away. Evan might have too.
~z~You tell me, boss. What's going on? Why did you call?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~告诉我，老板。怎么回事？找我干嘛？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I see them right in back of us.
~z~No, no, I don't mean that. I mean, tell him, tell him I'm okay, you know, tell him I'm on the up...
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~不不不不不，不是这意思。你去告诉他，说我好得很，懂吧，最近蒸蒸日上...

E2T7BA.original: ~z~He may have cheated on me, and stolen from me, and put his plastic surgery on the business credit card,
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~他可能出轨了，偷我东西，还刷商务卡给自己整容，

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Fuck! There's a van full of them too.
~z~I'm sure of it. He bleeted, didn't he?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我很肯定。他都发上网了，不是吗？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Tony, I knew it was a bad idea you sending me with Evan, man. A seriously bad idea.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~Tony，就知道我跟Evan坐一辆车是个坏主意。糟到不能再糟了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~That fuck got himself killed, and our diamonds stolen I might add,
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~那家伙害死了自己，还害我们丢了钻石，

E2T7BA.original: ~z~You're smarter than these guys. Lose them.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~你比他们聪明多了。甩掉他们。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~TanMan89 bleeted less than ten minutes ago.
~z~-Yeah, that's what I think, I agree. Completely. ~n~ ~c~ - Shut up, please!
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~－是啊，我也这么想。我同意，完全同意。~n~~c~－你可闭嘴吧！

E2T7BA.original: ~z~This coke is kind of speedy, Rock.
~z~We got more of them in the rearview.
~z~That chopper is making me uncomfortable. Get him off us!
~z~Come on, can we do the hand over please and get out of here? This is too much.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~拜托，咱能不能快点完事走人？别那么多废话。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~He ain't looking so good, T. That's all I can say. You gonna have to do this thing without us. Goodbye, bro.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~他看起来不太好，T，只能这么说。你自己一个人去吧。再见，兄弟。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~What is wrong with you? Tony, get up, baby.
~z~because he needed to tell the internet about his problems. Ayo. I can speak ill of him as much as I fucking want.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~因为他忙着在网上证明自己有病。哎，骂他的话根本说不完。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~But for right now, let's just see what the chef has to say for himself.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~但是现在，先看看这个厨子有什么要说的吧。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~We lost them, T. I'll take you home.
~z~That helicopter pilot is giving me the evil eye.
~z~They gone, bro. I'll get you home.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~他们走了，兄弟。我会带你回去的。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Ignore him, he's probably been up all night with some bimbo.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~别理他，可能是跟哪个蠢妞玩了一宿犯傻了。
~z~简单的交易居然闹了这么大。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Get us out of here, they're right behind us.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~带我们逃出去，后面还追着呢。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Jesus, man, I feel like a camel shat in my mouth and it wasn't fun.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我天，感觉像是嘴里含了坨骆驼屎，味道差极了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Fuck. Get that tank off the back of us.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~操。快解决那个坦克一样的东西。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~So, no. Luis. We're a long way from cool.
~z~We don't pay the cops off to get attacked by them.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~给警察出工资不是为了被他们袭击的。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~No one is that vain, not even him.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~不会这么缺心眼的，他也一样。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~we've for no more cards to play. What the fuck is going to go wrong next?
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我们无牌可出了，接下来还会出什么岔子？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Costas! If these bikers don't kill us, your driving will.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~Costas！要是没被飞车党杀掉，也要被你的车技害死了。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Keep your septums all in one piece.
~z~Let me get us out this situation, and you might not have to worry about that, T.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~等我甩掉这帮警察，你就不用考虑这些了，T。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~We just lost two million on those diamonds.
~z~You better not be spiking me with speed, Rock, or I will be so angry...
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~你不会掺了兴奋剂吧，Rock，老娘要发飙了...

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I thought you'd be an explosives expert by now. Get them!
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~你现在是爆破大师吧。炸死他们！

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Get rid of that thing. It's freaking me out.
~z~Beautiful clarity, well cut and a shit load of carats.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~成色美丽，切工精良，还他妈份量十足。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Yeah, get up you has been, no good 1980s throw back relapse junkie fag.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~起来啊，老家伙。活在80年代的废物土老帽，毒瘾复发的死基佬。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Get that fucking tank-thing off of us, Lou.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~快把那个坦克一样的东西给解决了，Lou。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~That's another humongous fuck-up we got our friend Rocco Pelosi to thank for.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~这次又是Rocco Pelosi给我们添的一桩大麻烦。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Oh yeah, we done plenty of things that could send us away Tone. We in deep for more than this.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~喂，我们做的事都够当场击毙了，Tone。一点都不清白。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Luis, promise you'll be my cellmate if we get sent down. Everyone's going to be lining up to kick a gay jew's ass.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~Luis，被抓了你一定要当我狱友。所有人都等着踢我这个犹太基佬的屁股。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~You're meant to be a professional driver.
~z~My head is killing me, my life has been reduced to this bullshit.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我头都快炸了，人生沦落到这种境地。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Stay cool and don't get too fucked up on those pills, or that charlie, or any fucking new shit.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~保持冷静，别嗑那些药片了，别吸可卡因，啥都别碰。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~"Cornered by bikerz. Eugh. Eugh. Eugh. 2" - the number not the word -
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~「被飞车党困住了。啊，啊，啊。5」是数不是字，

E2T7BA.original: ~z~He's not going to update some social networking site when a couple of dozen irate bikers are trying to kill him, bro.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~他被一群飞车党追杀，不可能这会儿更新动态吧，兄弟。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I couldn't take it, T. Evan's your boyfriend, not mine. You should have rode with him.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我受不了了，T。Evan是你男友，又不是我的。你怎么不陪他？

E2T7BA.original: ~z~I am not going to jail for the rest of my life over this.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~我才不要为此蹲半辈子监狱。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Hey Evan ripped you off and he didn't get away with it, look at it like that. I'll come see you soon.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~Evan算计了你，然后遭报应了，换个角度吧。回头再找你。

E2T7BA.original: ~z~Mr. Tony I have what I tell you, perfect clarity.
E2T7BA.translated: ~z~Tony先生，我之前可没骗你，净度完美，
